Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) has been studied as one of the most amazing development in energy production that could work directly with hydrocarbon fuel without reforming procedure.
Titulo: Performance analysis of hollow fibre-based micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell utilising methane fuel

Sentencas: This study was conducted to analyse the micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell (MT-SOFC) in terms of its performance by utilising methane as the fuel, subsequently compared with hydrogen.
Titulo: Performance analysis of hollow fibre-based micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell utilising methane fuel

Sentencas: MT-SOFC that was investigated in this work consisted of thin cathode layer, coated onto co-extruded anode/electrolyte dual-layer hollow fibre (HF); in which its anode was made of nickel (Ni), coupled with cerium-gadolinium oxide (CGO) as an electrolyte, whereas the cathode was lanthanum strontium cobalt ferrite (LSCF) and CGO.
Titulo: Performance analysis of hollow fibre-based micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell utilising methane fuel

Sentencas: The physical analyses carried out were three-point bending test and scanning electron microscopy (SEM).
Titulo: Performance analysis of hollow fibre-based micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell utilising methane fuel

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction (XRD) analysis was further conducted to examine the carbon deposition in HFs.
Titulo: Performance analysis of hollow fibre-based micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell utilising methane fuel

Sentencas: In evaluating the performance of HFs, current-voltage (IV) measurement, as well as impedance analysis of various temperatures range from 500 degrees C to 700 degrees C were performed.
Titulo: Performance analysis of hollow fibre-based micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell utilising methane fuel

Sentencas: Based on the results, the OCV, maximum power density and ohmic ASR of MT-SOFC exposed to methane fuel, were at 0.79 V, 0.22 W cm(-2) and 0.31 Omega cm(2); compared to the other that was exposed to hydrogen fuel, recorded at 0.89 V, 0.67 W cm(-2) and 0.19 Omega cm(2) respectively.
Titulo: Performance analysis of hollow fibre-based micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell utilising methane fuel

Sentencas: This indicates that there was a significant reduction in cell performance when methane was used as the fuel, due to the carbon deposition as proven by SEM, three-point bending and XRD.
Titulo: Performance analysis of hollow fibre-based micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell utilising methane fuel
